content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from the AI suggesting to use TensorFlow to train a machine learning model to play the game effectively. I added this information to "league_of_legends_bot_machine_learning.txt" using the "write_to_file" command. All previous information was added to respective files. Additionally, the AI suggested using OpenCV to analyze the game screen and extract relevant information, and PyAutoGUI to control the game by simulating mouse and keyboard inputs, which I added to "league_of_legends_bot_opencv.txt" and "league_of_legends_bot_controls.txt" respectively using the "write_to_file" command.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_web_interface.txt", "text": "We can use Selenium WebDriver to automate interactions with the game\'s web interface."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
